statements: SELECT * FROM dashboard_metrics WHERE metric_id = 1;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM dashboard_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT metric_id, metric_name, metric_value, timestamp FROM dashboard_metrics WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT metric_name FROM dashboard_metrics WHERE metric_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM dashboard_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM dashboard_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value, timestamp FROM dashboard_metrics WHERE metric_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY metric_name ASC, metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM dashboard_metrics WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY metric_id DESC;
SELECT metric_name, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_value FROM dashboard_metrics GROUP BY metric_name HAVING AVG(metric_value) > 50 ORDER BY avg_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM dashboard_metrics WHERE metric_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC, metric_value DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM dashboard_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT metric, value FROM dashboard_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT timestamp, metric, value FROM dashboard_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT graph_type, graph_data FROM visualization_data WHERE id < 10 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM visualization_data WHERE graph_type = 'bar' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM dashboard_data ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, metric, value FROM dashboard_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31'
SELECT timestamp, graph_type, jsonb_pretty(graph_data) FROM visualization_data WHERE graph_type = 'bar' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT metric, AVG(value) AS average_value FROM dashboard_data GROUP BY metric HAVING AVG(value) > 50
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM visualization_data
SELECT * FROM Dashboard;
SELECT dashboard_name, dashboard_type FROM Dashboard;
SELECT visualization_name FROM Visualization WHERE dashboard_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MonitoringData WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT visualization_id, COUNT(*) FROM MonitoringData GROUP BY visualization_id;
SELECT * FROM Dashboard;
SELECT dashboard_id, dashboard_name FROM Dashboard ORDER BY dashboard_id DESC;
SELECT V.visualization_name, D.dashboard_name FROM Visualization V INNER JOIN Dashboard D ON V.dashboard_id = D.dashboard_id;
SELECT MAX(metric_value), MIN(metric_value) FROM MonitoringData WHERE visualization_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MonitoringData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM dashboard_data WHERE metric_name='sales'
SELECT id, metric_name, value FROM dashboard_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM visualization_data WHERE data_source_id=2
SELECT id, entity_name, business_type FROM business_entities WHERE business_type='customer'
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM monitoring_logs
SELECT * FROM dashboard_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, metric_name, value FROM dashboard_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT entity_id, entity_name, business_type FROM business_entities WHERE business_type = 'Retail' ORDER BY entity_id;
SELECT visualization_src, chart_type FROM visualization_data WHERE data_source_id = 5 ORDER BY visualization_src ASC;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM monitoring_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Dashboard;
SELECT id, name, created_at FROM Visualization WHERE type = 'Bar Chart';
SELECT metric_name, value, date FROM BusinessMetrics WHERE value > 100 AND date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT dashboard_id, visualization_id FROM DashboardVisualizationMapping ORDER BY dashboard_id DESC;
SELECT role_name, user_id FROM UserRoles WHERE user_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM Dashboard;
SELECT id, name, description FROM Visualization WHERE type = 'Pie Chart';
SELECT id, metric_name, value FROM BusinessMetrics ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC;
SELECT d.id, v.name FROM Dashboard d JOIN DashboardVisualizationMapping m ON d.id = m.dashboard_id JOIN Visualization v ON m.visualization_id = v.id;
SELECT u.id, u.role_name, r.created_at FROM UserRoles u JOIN Users r ON u.user_id = r.id WHERE u.role_name = 'Admin';
